arts.ttl: Man Utd star singled out after disappointing Tottenham display - 'Not ready'
arts.sum: Manchester United managed to salvage a point against Tottenham Hotspur in North London, but one Red Devils star has been the target of some severe criticism from pundits

arts.ttl: Thomas Frank explains why he took off 22y/o attacker in Tottenham 2-2 Man Utd
arts.sum: Thomas Frank explains why he took Xavi Simons off after Tottenham Hotspur were held to a 2-2 draw against Manchester United.

arts.ttl: Man Utd stars respond as injury issues mount for Ruben Amorim after Tottenham draw
arts.sum: Manchester United were held to a 2-2 draw at Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday in the Premier League, and ended the match with ten men after already making all their five substitutions

arts.ttl: Tottenham 2-2 Manchester United: Late action sees the points shared in North London
arts.sum: But Spurs fought back in the second half with two goals in less than ten minutes from Mathys Tel and Richarlison, tipping the game in the home side's favour. Spurs had their first good chance of the game in the 16th minute when a superb cross from Brennan Johnson was not given the finish it deserved.

arts.ttl: Drab to dramatic - but questions for Spurs & Man Utd after 'strange' draw
arts.sum: A dramatic - or drab - Saturday lunchtime Premier League match with as many questions as answers, and for Manchester United a major injury scare.

arts.ttl: Tottenham vs. Man United Player Ratings: Randal Kolo Muani flounders while Mathys Tel shines
arts.sum: GK Guglielmo Vicario It is getting difficult to talk about Vicario because we are generally allowing so few shots at the moment, and he is dealing with through

arts.ttl: Bryan Mbeumo likened to Mohamed Salah after latest Man Utd goal vs Tottenham
arts.sum: Manchester United star Bryan Mbeumo has started the season well with the Red Devils and has been compared to Liverpool star Mohamed Salah following his latest goal against Spurs

arts.ttl: Thomas Frank responds to Tottenham fans after being booed in Man Utd draw
arts.sum: Thomas Frank bore the brunt of criticism from Tottenham fans during the North London sideâ€™s 2-2 draw with Manchester United and the Dane has now spoken out after a substitution was booed

arts.ttl: Why Tottenham players were 'mad' after Manchester United draw as dressing room feelings revealed
arts.sum: Manchester United were held to a 2-2 draw by Tottenham in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon to stretch their unbeaten to five games thanks to Matthijs de Ligt's late leveller

arts.ttl: Matthijs de Ligt can't hide true feelings after scoring Man Utd equaliser vs Tottenham
arts.sum: Manchester United star Matthijs de Ligt scored a crucial goal to earn his side a point in stoppage time against Tottenham but was still left upset following the Premier League clash
